# Flow Train — Brand Portal

This repository is the **single source of truth** for Flow Train’s
brand, documentation templates, system theming, and course materials.

## Repository Structure
- /docs → Notion, Confluence, and GitHub documentation kits
- /courses → Training slide & lab foundations
- /system → OS themes and device assets
- /website → Public brand microsite

## Usage
- Instructors: start in /courses
- Operations & docs: /docs
- IT & device setup: /system
